issue.title: [CF 990] tellmewhen - not making sounds
issue.body:
Can't get sound notifications to work for me. Even with Sound Effects enabled in-game and using the master sound channel.
Disabling all other addons doesn't help.

Even from the sound selection list, I can't get any of the files to play.

The icon in question - though I can't get any to make a sound.
^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^STaunt;~`Death~`Grip;~`Provoke;~`Growl;~`Dark~`Command;~`Mocking~`Banner;~`Righteous~`Defense ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SSound ^SSound^STMW~`-~`Ding~`3 ^SEvent^SOnShow ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S[Source] ^t^t^t^SUnit^Starget ^SEnabled^B ^t^N70206^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Normally I'd think it was something on my end, but bigwigs sound notifications continue to function correctly.


> Posted by CurseForge user booi | Imported from CurseForge issue #990 | Raw

comments.body:
You're asking a icon to show for debuffs that just don't exist.

When someone taunts you're better off looking at Spell Cast Success.

You go from what you had to:

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_CAST_SUCCESS^B ^t^SType^Scleu ^SName^STaunt;`Death`Grip;`Provoke;`Growl;`Dark`Command;`Mocking`Banner;`Righteous`Defense ^SCLEUDur^N1 ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SSound ^SSound^STMW`-`Ding`3 ^SEvent^SOnShow ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S[Source] ^t^t^t^SUnit^Starget ^SEnabled^B ^t^N70307^S`| ^Sicon^^

I could be wrong but this isn't really a bug - more of a question for the forum.


> Posted by CurseForge user Torchler
